tasks.task: Describe the biochar production process and its benefits for farming.
subtasks: Explain the role of gasification in converting biomass into biochar.
Discuss the manufacturing of biochar from manure in comparison to wood.
Outline the removal of pathogens and contaminants from manure biochar.
Describe the nutrient composition of manure biochar and its agricultural applications.
Highlight the environmental benefits of using biochar and managing manure.
Explain the economic and revenue streams associated with biochar production projects.
